japanese: この花はあの花より美しい。
english: This flower is more beautiful than that one.

japanese: テニスは野球より人気があります。
english: Tennis is more popular than baseball.

japanese: この数学の問題はあれより難しい。
english: This math problem is more difficult than that.

japanese: 彼は世界で最も有名な歌手です。
english: He is the most famous singer in the world.

japanese: 健康はお金より大切です。
english: Health is more important than money.

japanese: これは店で一番高価なカバンです。
english: This is the most expensive bag in the store.

japanese: 英語は私にとって一番面白い教科です。
english: English is the most interesting subject for me.

japanese: 彼は私より注意深く運転します。
english: He drives more carefully than I.

japanese: 彼女はクラスで一番背が高い女の子の１人です。
english: She is one of the tallest girls in our class.

japanese: このビデオゲームはあれよりワクワクします。
english: This video game is more exciting than that one.
